item.description:
Boston Massacre vs. Maine Roller Derby Port Authorities (Portland)

Doors at 5 pm, Bout at 6 pm
Shriners Auditorium, Wilmington, MA
Tickets $14 in advance, $16 at the door
Season tickets now available! 9 nights, 17 bouts for $117â€”just $6.88 per bout!

Season Three kicks off with a single-header bout between the Boston Massacre travel team and our northern nemesisters, the ever-ready Maine Roller Derby Port Authorities. The Port Authorities wrapped up an undefeated season in October 2008 after scoring victories against Long Island, Connecticut, Montreal, and Providence Roller Derby.



Slim Jim and the Mad Cows return to Shriners with their countryfried metal at halftime. And as always, the after party dance floor is open to all, with DJs Sir Trix-a-Lot and John Barera spinning until midnight.

http://www.bostonderb...
item.how_to_find_us: Members should tape my picture to their heads, and I will find them.
item.name: Roller Derby! Boston Massacre vs. Maine Roller Derby Port Authorities
